basics.name: Huu Nhat Huy NGUYEN
basics.summary: A dedicated Vietnamese student expanding my expertise in latest technologies while pursuing academic excellence in France.

work.name: Orange Innovation, Orange Gardens
work.summary: Conducting advanced research on optimizing Large Language Models inference for improved energy efficiency on GPU infrastructures.
highlights: Developing energy-optimized techniques for LLM inference on GPUs, reducing computational costs while maintaining model performance
Implementing and evaluating vLLM serving frameworks for code-specialized language models including CodeLlama, Codestral, and DeepSeek-Coder, etc.
Researching and applying various quantization methods to balance inference speed, memory usage, and model accuracy
Benchmarking performance metrics across different model architectures and inference configurations

work.name: Laboratoire Informatique Fondamentale et Appliquée de Tours (LIFAT)
work.summary: Conducted research in unsupervised learning, focusing on the development of neural networks for image reconstruction and generation tasks.
highlights: Deepened understanding of machine learning principles and probability theory through practical application
Studied Auto-Encoders and Variational Auto-Encoders (VAEs) as generative models with latent variables, implementing them on the MNIST dataset
Re-implemented and analyzed seminal papers including 'Auto-encoding Variational Bayes' and 'Tutorial on Variational Autoencoders'
Developed practices in applied mathematics, and image processing using Python/PyTorch frameworks

education.institution: Institut National des Sciences Appliquées (INSA) Centre Val de Loire
INSA Centre Val de Loire campus Hué

awards.title: Odon Vallet Scholarship
awards.summary: Recipient of a full-tuition scholarship for engineering studies at INSA Centre Val de Loire.

certificates.name: Introduction to Computer Vision and Image Processing

interests.name: Running
keywords: I finished half-marathon in Quy Nhon, Vietnam before going abroad. Now I'm trying to do running weekly to strengthen my physical and my mental health.

interests.name: Podcasts
keywords: I love listen to podcast while commuting to work or while multitasking. Some of my favorite influencers are Naval, Andrew Huberman, Chris Williamson and Scott Galloway

volunteer.summary: Produced a promotional campus discovery video as part of an initiative to introduce the INSA group to Vietnamese high school students.
highlights: Created engaging visual content showcasing campus facilities and student life.
Contributed to international outreach efforts to attract Vietnamese students to INSA programs.
Utilized video production skills to effectively communicate the educational opportunities available at INSA.
